00041       bool Vorbis::open(string fileName, string fileId) {
00042         //      this -> dspDev = this -> ddata -> getDSPDev();
00043         //      this -> dspDev = "default";
00044         this -> fileName = fileName;
00045 
00046         int openRetVal = ov_fopen(
00047             const_cast < char* > (this -> fileName.c_str()), &vf);
00048 
00049         if (openRetVal < 0) {
00050           cerr << "Error to open file " << this -> fileName << endl;
00051           exit(-1);
00052         }
00053 
00054         vi = ov_info(&vf, -1);
00055         //      this -> ddata -> setMainParam(Utils::Func::getFileSize(
00056         //          this -> fileName.c_str()), ov_time_total(&vf, -1), vi -> channels,
00057         //          vi -> rate, vi -> bitrate_nominal, -1);
00058         this -> readVorbisComment();
00059       }

00061       void Vorbis::play(string fileId) {
00062         if (seek == 0) {
00063           ov_fopen(const_cast < char* > (this -> fileName.c_str()),
00064               &this -> pvf);
00065         }
00066 
00067         if (ov_seekable(&this -> pvf)) {
00068           this -> length = ov_time_total(&this -> pvf, -1);
00069         } else {
00070           cout << "Source is not seekable." << endl;
00071         }
00072 
00073         const int buf_size = 64;
00074         char buf[buf_size];
00075 
00076         int eof = 0;
00077         int current_section = 0;
00078 
00079         while (!eof) {
00080           long ret = ov_read(&this -> pvf, buf, buf_size, 0, 2, 1,
00081               &current_section);
00082           if (ret == 0) {
00083             eof = 1;
00084           } else if (ret < 0) {
00085             cerr << "ERROR in ov_read()" << endl;
00086           } else {
00087             //            ao->play(buf, buf_size);
00088           }
00089         }
00090         ov_clear(&pvf);
00091       }

00105       void Vorbis::setSeek(string fileId, float val) {
00106         this -> seek = 1;
00107 
00108         int retCode = ov_time_seek(&this -> pvf, ((this -> length)
00109             * (val / 100)));
00110         if (retCode != 0) {
00111           if (retCode == OV_ENOSEEK) {
00112             cout << "Error in ov_time_seek(): Bitstream is not seekable"
00113                 << endl;
00114           } else if (retCode == OV_EINVAL) {
00115             cout
00116                 << "Error in ov_time_seek(): Invalid argument value; possibly called with an OggVorbis_File structure that isn't open"
00117                 << endl;
00118           } else if (retCode == OV_EREAD) {
00119             cout
00120                 << "Error in ov_time_seek(): A read from media returned an error"
00121                 << endl;
00122           } else if (retCode == OV_EFAULT) {
00123             cout
00124                 << "Error in ov_time_seek(): Internal logic fault; indicates a bug or heap/stack corruption."
00125                 << endl;
00126           } else if (retCode == OV_EBADLINK) {
00127             cout
00128                 << "Error in ov_time_seek(): Invalid stream section supplied to libvorbisfile, or the requested link is corrupt."
00129                 << endl;
00130           }
00131         }
00132       }
00133 
00134       float Vorbis::getSeek(string fileId) {
00135         if (this -> length == 0) {
00136           return 0;
00137         } else {
00138           return (100 / (this -> length / ov_time_tell(
00139               const_cast < OggVorbis_File* > (&this -> pvf))));
00140         }
00141       }

00147       void Vorbis::readVorbisComment(void) {
00148         //    cout << ov_comment ( &vf, -1 ) -> vendor << endl;
00149         char **ptr = ov_comment(&vf, -1) -> user_comments;
00150 
00151         vector < string > vorbisCommList;

00154         vorbisComm . clear();
00155 
00156         while (*ptr) {
00157           string myStr = *ptr;
00158           int find = myStr . find_first_of("=");
00159           if (find) {
00160             //          vorbisComm[Utils::Func::toUpper(myStr . substr(0, find))]
00161             //              = myStr . substr(find + 1);
00162           }
00163           ++ptr;
00164         }
00165         //      this -> ddata -> setVorbisComment(vorbisComm);
00166       }
